author: mikeshardmind(Sinbad)
DiscordLiz
name: GuildJoinRestrict
description: Log or leave guilds based on a configured list of allowed or blocked guilds and or guild owners.
install_message: If you notice any bugs, open an issue. If you are a previous user of guildblacklist/guildwhitelist you can update those cogs to have an additional command in them that pushes their settings over to this cog.
